rows.label: bf08480100_0010
rows.name: I am the Driver of the Master Blade.

rows.label: bf08480100_0030
rows.name: I possess the power to command all Blades.

rows.label: bf08480100_0042
rows.name: even the very Divine Beasts are under my control.

rows.label: bf08480100_0050
rows.name:
...That must be how he repelled the attack...
Sooner or later, he'll control us too.

rows.label: bf08480100_0070
rows.name: Half-breeds like you won't come under his control.

rows.label: bf08480100_0080
rows.name: Sure, he can dampen your power.

rows.label: bf08480100_0082
rows.name: But that's why we built those things.

rows.label: bf08480100_0090
rows.name:
Satahiko's creations 
will not submit to Marveni's control.

rows.label: bf08480100_0100
rows.name: And neither will this bucket of bolts!

rows.label: bf08480100_0110
rows.name: We're nearly at the boundary layer.

rows.label: bf08480100_0170
rows.name: Hey, when you see our daddy dear...

rows.label: bf08480100_0180
rows.name: Tell him "thanks for everything" from me.
